projects.name: Edith Glasses
projects.description: Bone conduction glasses merging hearing aid functionality with wireless audio. 3D-printed custom casing integrating PCB from repurposed AirPods for seamless audio experience.

projects.name: Red-light Green-light
projects.description: Real-life recreation of the Squid Game challenge using computer vision. Revised C++ vision training model to run on ESP32, tracking player movement during 'red light' phases. Integrated with custom laser tag vest that activates when motion is detected. Built in 32-hour hackathon.
